response.overview: A cross-portrait in which 3 centuries separate Edward Hopper from Johannes Vermeer, and also separate "New York office" from "Woman in blue reading a letter", as the film brings two artists together in their particular vision of the world.
response.tagline: A cross-portrait in which 3 centuries separate Edward Hopper from Johannes Vermeer, and also separate "New York office" from "Woman in blue reading a letter", as the film brings two artists together in their particular vision of the world.
response.title: Hopper X Vermeer
